verses.roman:
mahā-prasāda vallabha-bhaṭṭa bahu ānāila
prabhu-saha sannyāsi-gaṇa bhojane vasila

synonyms: mahā-prasāda—food offered to Śrī Jagannātha; vallabha-bhaṭṭa—Vallabha Bhaṭṭa; bahu—a large quantity; ānāila—brought; prabhu-saha—with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sannyāsi-gaṇa—all the sannyāsīs; bhojane vasila—sat down to accept the prasāda.
translation: Vallabha Bhaṭṭa had brought a large quantity of mahā-prasāda offered to Lord Jagannātha. Thus all the sannyāsīs sat down to eat with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
